content: How can I modify the notion of achieving success to create an adjective clause using PHP code, while also ensuring that the clause is dynamic and changes based on the value of $success? For instance, if $success is equal to 100%, the clause should reflect the highest level of achievement, while a value of 50% should reflect a moderate level of success. How can I incorporate this variable-based flexibility into a sentence like "The [adjective clause] businessman was praised for his accomplishments"?
